[系]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): abbreviated 手 + 糸 . Also used as simplified forms:
• Simplified from 繫 ( 𣪠 → 丿 ) (through an intermediate form 毄).
• Simplified from 係 (elimination of 人 ).

[繫]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *keːɡs, *ɡeːɡs ): phonetic 毄 ( jī ) + semantic 糸 ( “ thread ” )

[繋]
variant form of 繫
